name: It's Cold Out There V2
description:
You are stranded in a freezing snowland with no end in sight. All you have to keep yourself from a cold end is a generator. But beware, the generator will not last forever. Scavenge the frigid wasteland and craft the resources your generator needs; try to last as long as you can.

In game you got 2 timers the one on the left is players time it can go outside the zone. And the right timer is the generator's time until death, this can be re activated by feeding it.
